Package com.continuuity.loom.scheduler.task

Classes for coordinating tasks and jobs.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ClusterJob A job contains information related to what needs to be done to perform and coordinate a cluster operation.
ClusterService Service for performing operations on clusters.
ClusterTask A task is some action that must be executed on a single node in the cluster.
JobId Job ids are of the form clusterid-jobid, where ids are numeric.
NodeService Service for performing actions on Nodes.
TaskConfig Methods for getting config to attach to a cluster task.
TaskId Task ids are of the format clusterid-jobnum-tasknum, where all ids and numbers are numeric.
TaskQueueService Manages handing out tasks from task queue, and recording status after the task is done.
TaskService Service for performing operations on ClusterTasks.
 

Enum Summary
ClusterJob.Status Job status.
ClusterTask.Status Task status.
 

Exception Summary
TaskException Thrown to indicate that there was a problem creating a cluster job or task.
 

Package com.continuuity.loom.scheduler.task Description

Classes for coordinating tasks and jobs.
